overview:
Mr. Marflak’s vision inspired him to lead the charge to develop a comprehensive suite of online products and services that is now being used by thousands of schools and millions of students, parents, teachers and administrators across the United States and Mexico.

Prior to launching Schoolwires, Mr. Marflak put his expertise in marketing, technology and business development to work by delivering strategic Internet consulting solutions to Fortune 500 companies, numerous national associations and a Big 10 University. Raised in a family of educators, Mr. Marflak is a graduate of The Pennsylvania State University Smeal College of Business Administration.

“We at Schoolwires are passionate about what we do. We firmly believe the Internet is one of the next great equalizers of education. We are using it today to help students and schools to achieve more. In the process, we are blessed and gratified to be building one of America’s fastest growing and most respected educational technology companies.”
